profileAlternative.name: Nisha Iyer
profileAlternative.headline: Director of Data Science
profileAlternative.summary:
I am currently the Director of Data Science at Data Society, an EdTech company located in Washington D.C.

My data science tool kit: R, Python,Spark, Hadoop, AWS, Pig, SAS, Unix/Bash, Tableau, SQL, NoSQL,R Shiny, Data Mining +.

As a data scientist, in addition to gaining industry experience in this area, I recently completed a Master’s degree in Business Analytics. I am gaining expertise in areas such as finding and gathering data, data mining and preprocessing, statistics, machine learning, natural language processing and data visualization; to reveal the story that the data is expressing and employ data driven results within organizations.
